message: I propose taking $60 for myself and giving you $40. This seems fair considering the devaluation affects me more.

Given the higher rate of devaluation for you, I propose $55 for myself and $45 for you. This offer considers the impact of inflation on both of us but also reflects the value of the money in the next round if we continue.
